summary: An ordinance providing the transfer of the sum of $108,500.00 from Seattle Bridge Bonds, Series G-2, 1931 Construction Fund, to the Aurora Avenue Condemnation Fund, established by Ordinance No. 59749, and further providing that the sum of $15,414.98 heretofore transferred from said Construction Fund to said Condemnation Fund as a loan, is hereby set over to the latter Fund as a permanent transfer and declaring an emergency.
